note.p: Education: Heidelberg; Marburg; Berlin. MD (1853, Berlin)

Career: Practised in Frankfurt, then gave up medicine; Privat Docent in Botany, Tubingen; Extraordinary Professor of Botany (1855-1859), then Ordinary Professor of Botany (1859-1867), Freiburg; Ordinary Professor of Botany, Halle (1867-1872); Professor of Botany, Strasbourg (1872-1884); died of sarcoma of the jaw; studied pleomorphism of fungi
Notes: DSB gives death date as 19 January 1888
